de.name: gnome-init
de.description: Gnome - Remove Superkey Overlay keybinding to Activities Overview

de.name: gnome-term
de.description: Gnome - Terminal - Superkey+Space opens Activities Overview

de.name: gnome-gui
de.description: Gnome - GUI - Ctrl+Space opens Activities Overview

de.name: kde-init
de.description: KDE Plasma 5 - Removes Superkey Overlay from the Launcher Menu
de.run: gsettings set org.gnome.mutter overlay-key '';kwriteconfig5 --file ~/.config/kwinrc --group ModifierOnlyShortcuts --key Meta "";qdbus org.kde.KWin /KWin reconfigure
